data.text: Mmuaeɛ pa dwodwo abufuo,
Onyansafoɔ tɛkrɛma yi nimdeɛ ayɛ,
Awurade ani hunu baabiara,
Tɛkrɛma a ɛde abodwoɔ ba yɛ nkwa dua,
Ɔkwasea mmfa nʼagya ntenesoɔ nyɛ hwee,
Ahonya bebree wɔ ɔteneneeni fie,
Anyansafoɔ ano trɛtrɛ nimdeɛ mu;
Awurade kyiri amumuyɛfoɔ afɔrebɔ,
Awurade kyiri amumuyɛfoɔ akwan,
Asotwe denden wɔ hɔ ma dea ɔmane firi ɛkwan no so,
Owuo ne Ɔsɛeɛ da Awurade anim,
Ɔfɛdifoɔ mpɛ ntenesoɔ;
Anigyeɛ akoma ma anim yɛ seresere,
Nhunumufoɔ akoma hwehwɛ nimdeɛ,
Wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so nna nyinaa yɛ mmɔbɔmmɔbɔ,
Ketewa bi a yɛnya a Awurade suro ka ho no yɛ
Nhahamma aduane a ɔdɔ wɔ mu no yɛ
Deɛ ne bo fu ntɛm de mpaapaemu ba,
Nkasɛɛ ama onihafoɔ kwan asi,
Ɔba nyansafoɔ ma nʼagya ani gye
Agyimisɛm ma deɛ ɔnni adwene ani gye,
Nhyehyɛeɛ a ɛnni afotuo no sɛe,
Onipa a ɔma mmuaeɛ a ɛfata no ani gye,
Onyansafoɔ asetena mu kwan ma no nkɔsoɔ
Awurade sɛe ɔhantanni fie
Awurade kyiri amumuyɛfoɔ nsusuiɛ,
Ɔdufudepɛfoɔ de ɔhaw brɛ nʼabusua,
Ɔteneneeni akoma kari ne mmuaeɛ,
Awurade mmɛn amumuyɛfoɔ koraa
Animu a ɛteɛ ma akoma nya ahomeka,
Deɛ ɔtie animka a ɛma nkwa no
Deɛ ɔmfa ahohyɛsoɔ no bu ne ho animtiaa,
Awurade suro kyerɛ onipa nyansa,
